Whether you're looking to migrate existing applications, build new cloud-native solutions, or optimize your current cloud environment, our team of experts will guide you through every step of the process.

### Migration Approaches

We offer multiple migration approaches to suit your specific needs and goals:

```{=html}
<div class="row mt-4">
  <div class="col-md-6">
    <div class="card mb-4">
      <div class="card-header bg-primary text-white">
        <h3 class="card-title mb-0">Rehost (Lift & Shift)</h3>
      </div>
      <div class="card-body">
        <p>Moving applications to the cloud with minimal changes, maintaining the same architecture and functionality while leveraging cloud infrastructure.</p>
        <p><strong>Best for:</strong> Legacy applications with minimal cloud dependencies, rapid migration requirements, or when immediate cloud benefits are needed.</p>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
  
  <div class="col-md-6">
    <div class="card mb-4">
      <div class="card-header bg-primary text-white">
        <h3 class="card-title mb-0">Refactor/Re-architect</h3>
      </div>
      <div class="card-body">
        <p>Modifying applications to better leverage cloud-native features and services, improving performance, scalability, and management.</p>
        <p><strong>Best for:</strong> Applications that need to scale or perform better in the cloud, or when you want to add features that are difficult to implement in the current environment.</p>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
  
  <div class="col-md-6">
    <div class="card mb-4">
      <div class="card-header bg-primary text-white">
        <h3 class="card-title mb-0">Rebuild</h3>
      </div>
      <div class="card-body">
        <p>Recreating an application from scratch in the cloud, using cloud-native architectures and services to maximize cloud benefits.</p>
        <p><strong>Best for:</strong> Applications that need significant updates or when existing solutions cannot meet business needs, allowing for complete modernization.</p>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
  
  <div class="col-md-6">
    <div class="card mb-4">
      <div class="card-header bg-primary text-white">
        <h3 class="card-title mb-0">Replace</h3>
      </div>
      <div class="card-body">
        <p>Moving to a SaaS solution instead of migrating an existing application, eliminating the need for application management altogether.</p>
        <p><strong>Best for:</strong> Standardized processes like CRM, email, or content management where existing SaaS solutions can provide the necessary functionality.</p>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
```

## Cloud Security Services {#security}

Our cloud security services ensure your cloud environment is protected against threats while maintaining compliance with relevant regulations and standards.

```{=html}
<div class="row mt-4">
  <div class="col-md-6">
    <div class="card mb-4">
      <div class="card-header bg-success text-white">
        <h3 class="card-title mb-0">Security Assessment</h3>
      </div>
      <div class="card-body">
        <ul>
          <li><strong>Cloud Configuration Review:</strong> Evaluation of cloud settings against best practices</li>
          <li><strong>Vulnerability Assessment:</strong> Identification of security weaknesses in cloud resources</li>
          <li><strong>Compliance Validation:</strong> Verification of compliance with relevant standards (GDPR, HIPAA, etc.)</li>
          <li><strong>Security Architecture Review:</strong> Analysis of overall cloud security design</li>
        </ul>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
  
  <div class="col-md-6">
    <div class="card mb-4">
      <div class="card-header bg-success text-white">
        <h3 class="card-title mb-0">Security Implementation</h3>
      </div>
      <div class="card-body">
        <ul>
          <li><strong>Identity & Access Management:</strong> Secure user and service authentication and authorization</li>
          <li><strong>Data Protection:</strong> Encryption, key management, and data loss prevention</li>
          <li><strong>Network Security:</strong> Firewalls, security groups, and network segmentation</li>
          <li><strong>Security Monitoring:</strong> Threat detection and incident response capabilities</li>
        </ul>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
```
